org.wso2.carbon.repository.core.config

Class RemoteConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wso2.carbon.repository.core.config.RemoteConfiguration

  • public class RemoteConfiguration
extends Object
    This class contains configuration of a remote instance.
